page.title: 17LIFE IN ROMSLEY/HUNNINGTON
page.content: Most families have two/three children. Almost all car owners(25%,2 cars).Most have colour TV.and'phone;20%computers. "I am Ed.Cockin,9yr.old.Have an older sister,Katherine.Father lived Old Hill mother Belbroughton.Lived Quinton when first married.Great-great grandma is buried at St.Kenelm's Church. A day in my life would be:-Saturday: Get up,let cat out of utility room, feed it breakfast,watch TV.Play in bedroom. Have dinner.Go in garden watch frogs by pool.Play.Watch TV.Sandwiches for tea.Dad building shed.Watch TV.Mum returns from Sava Centre.Some clothes for me.She makes coffee.Watch TV. Bed." "I am David Law.Dad teacher,Mom works Wednesday&Thursday.Two brothers,Andrew works DIY shop Quinton,Stephen works for "Nine Five"in London.Parents came to Romsley 17yr ago,as they liked it."
